pages.text: This item can store several redstone channels ($(5)right click$() on a $(l:rftoolsutility:logic/redstone_transmitter)Redstone Transmitter$(/l) or $(l:rftoolsutility:logic/redstone_receiver)Redstone Receiver$(/l) to add the channel). You can then put it in a $(l:rftoolsbase:tools/tablet)Tablet$(/l) which allows you to examine and change redstone signals from anywhere
